QuestData.Title: Mercy for the Living
QuestData.Description: You can see that the dead were the lucky ones. Those that live wander about attacking anything not infected with these vile spores.$b$bI cannot bring myself to slay them, but if you could bring mercy to those poor people I would be very grateful.
QuestData.CompletionText: Truly a grim task, bringing mercy to the infected...
QuestData.RewardText: Perhaps we shouldn't have wasted time on them, this place... drains me. Still it was a good deed you have done.
